Dear Mr. Hill:
Mr. James Armsey is out of town until November
22. I am therefore writing in his place to acknowlÂ¬
edge with thanks the travel voucher and the check

Chicago for the NAEB Public Relations Committee
meeting.
Sincerely yours.
